com.soen6441.core.tower

Class BottleTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.soen6441.core.map.MapItem
        • com.soen6441.core.tower.Tower
          • com.soen6441.core.tower.BottleTower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IArchive, EnableStrategy, TimerListener

    public class BottleTower
extends Tower
implements EnableStrategy
    This class is a specific type of tower, BottleTower. A BottleTower attacks a single target.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Haiyang Sun
    See Also:
    Tower
